title: Mystery gist
body: Hello i had riot kayle from the last year all my friends received the riot kayle skin but i didn't receive the mystery gift as riot said (i already have kayle and riot kayle from the last year) plz help me!!

replies.body: Gifts have not finished being sent out.  Stay up to date at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as we roll out gifts to every eligible accounts.  Patience!

ok ty i was just "scared" that sth happened like last year so i wouldn't take any gift :)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
